overview: David E. Chin is the CEO and co-founder of LoanKrunch, LLC. He is primarily responsible for corporate and business development efforts. David is an entrepreneurial corporate finance executive with over 15 years experience in VC-backed startups and Fortune 50 organizations focused on Real Estate and Technology. David is also Principal and Founder of Decco Group, Inc., a real estate and financial consulting firm and Decco Group, LLC, a real estate fund holding fund. Previously, David had served in various strategic planning and financial leadership roles at Yipes Enterprise Services, the leading provider of managed Ethernet and application delivery services(acquired by Reliance Communications) and The Walt Disney Company. David started his career as a certified public accountant at Ernst & Youngâ€™s Kenneth Leventhal Real Estate Group, specializing in consulting and audit services.
